_NoAddRefReleaseOnFdoPtr< T > Class Template Reference

#include <Ptr.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class _NoAddRefReleaseOnFdoPtr< T >

This class ensures T implements AddRef() and Release() and also ensures you cannot call it through the FdoPtr.
